abstract: JPMorgan Chase could cut as many as 4,000 of its own employees worldwide as the bank prepares to take on staff from Bear Stearns at the same time it deals with turmoil in financial markets, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase could cut as many as 4,000 of its own employees worldwide as the bank prepares to take on staff from Bear Stearns at the same time it deals with turmoil in financial markets, Reuters reported.

headline.main: JPMorgan May Cut 4,000 of Its Own

abstract: Jamie Dimon, the chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, has something to smile about this morning. His firm’s role in advising Hewlett-Packard in its $13.3 billion takeover of Electronic Data Systems comes not just with millions of dollars in advisory fees — but also with bragging rights.
lead_paragraph: Jamie Dimon, the chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, has something to smile about this morning. His firm’s role in advising Hewlett-Packard in its $13.3 billion takeover of Electronic Data Systems comes not just with millions of dollars in advisory fees — but also with bragging rights.

headline.main: JPMorgan Rides H.P. to Top of the Leagues
